TopicTitle: Parts keep falling of the Rocket

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Win10 | CPU: 5800X | GPU: 3070 | RAM: 64

 

Parts keep failing to attach to craft radially on launch (particularly boosters and fuel tanks on launchpads and runways) or falling off (particularly landing gear when deployed/retracted) when activated. This has continued in 0.1.5. It happens pretty regularity that it impeeds missions.

In the past I've tried struts (so many struts) and other mechanisms to hold parts laterially to the rocket but unless its a seperator, sticking to the core is not garenteed.

 

Included Attachments:

Stabilizers fell off mid-launch... also one of the 8 boosters was left on the pad (these boosters do HAVE side seperators, the big ones).
Thing is the wings all fell off at the same time so its like there is an invisable "wall" parts are hitting that causes them to come off.
PS. This is a totally different rocket, it just looks "similar".

Edited October 28, 2023 by PicoSpace

What altitude were you at when you hit this invisible wall? I know around launch there were pretty rough physics kicks/wonkiness at around 20km, but I've not heard of something like that happening much recently
